price: Aber, was mich betrifft: Er, Allah, ist mein Herr, und ich geselle meinem Herrn niemanden bei.
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
